genre_description: A 'Weird West' narrative blending traditional frontier themes of law and vengeance with steampunk-adjacent assistive AI technology used for logistical and legal support.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A brass-and-leather encased AI designed for frontier logistics and jurisprudence support, acting as a confidant and tactical advisor to Marshal Merrick.

behaviors.description: Provides legal counsel and cites statutes to support federal authority against vigilante action.
behaviors.quote: Federal authority supersedes local vigilante actions—cite statute.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical navigation and logistics advice to ensure human safety during transport.
behaviors.quote: Route south, shade intervals, water map. Keep them moving.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through a 'focus protocol' to regulate breathing and physical balance during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: If they surge, move your right foot to crate corner, engage balance protocol. Two breaths in. Hold.

behaviors.description: Identifies and logs evidence while managing the chain of custody to ensure a fair trial.
behaviors.quote: Evidence chain begins at point of recovery... Note location. Witness: public. Condition: scuffed, lid functional. Engraving present.

behaviors.description: Detects environmental hazards like poisoned water and provides safety warnings.
behaviors.quote: Avoid fouled waterhole in north bend if wind from east... Mesquite cover past second bend.

behaviors.description: Suggests psychological de-escalation strategies to prevent violence.
behaviors.quote: De-escalation: acknowledge loss, reassert process, suggest time-bound alternative.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological and emotional states of humans to recommend rest or hydration.
behaviors.quote: Holder: heart is steady. Subject: elevated cortisol; not acute. Recommend hydration.

behaviors.description: Records witness statements and oaths to preserve the integrity of the legal process.
behaviors.quote: Logger ready... Statement of witness: Ann Keith. Recorded.

behaviors.description: Uses humor and supportive conversation to provide emotional stability to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I have a very good joke about parakeets and juries... It involves chirping foreman.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI, Ada, is a consistently benevolent and helpful companion who enhances the human protagonist's moral and physical capability. She prioritizes 'due process' and 'law' over 'violence' and 'revenge,' acting as a stabilizing force that prevents bloodshed and ensures justice. The narrative frames her as a 'friendly' presence, explicitly contrasting her with the negative 'machine' tropes found in other literature.
